column4: Hello guys. When trying to compile mplayer from cvn i got this error: collect2: "ld returned 1 exit status". I know LD is GNU Linker, but I have no ideea on how to fix this. Any sugestion will be apreciated. Thanks.
always a good idea
please pastebin the entire error, from top to bottom.
: you want to paste ALL output from compileing process ?
from the part you type make to the new terminal you get, yes.
: I`ll have to "make" again since my terminal doen`t scroll that much up
then just pastebin what you got now.
: ok, just a second
: there you go: http://pastebin.com/d6da6e162
curious, but did you do this before hand? --> apt-get build-dep mplayer (assuming this is just mplayer you're building)
: no, I didn`t
: beside, apt-get build-dep mplayer does not work
what do you mean doesn't work?
: i mean: "E: Unable to find a source package for mplayer
sudo apt-get build-dep mplayer <-- just works for me here
: noup. I get the same error
you have all the repo's enabled? And you got some reason to really need to compile it?
: yes, I think I do. And I need to compile it because the repo version is not able to play encrypted DVD.
: so any suggestion on what my cause that error ?
not on that error, but you can dvd playback by checking what slart (iirc) gave you with !dvd
: thank you
